comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: I love these pics of schools with the pupils and teachers lined up outside...there's something timeless about them. The SLNSW has quite a few similar pics taken at NSW schools in the 19th century, which can be viewed on-line...I gather this is how 'school photographs' were done in the 19th century...the annual class photograph was still in the future.

comment.author: 69269002@N04
comment._content: Hi quasymody, thanks so much for your comment. We are very excited to be able to upload these amazing photos online and there's many more to come.
